UI.textUI

Class Selection<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • UI.textUI.Selection<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - any class
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String>

    public class Selection<E>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String>
    A Selection is a useful utility to prompt the user to select something from a Selectable.
